name: Winter Sports 3: The Great Tournament
overview: -Eight unique and distinct sports: boardercross, freeride skiing, Alpine skiing, ski flying, short-track speed skating, biathlon, bobsledding, and figure skating -Five game modes career, cup, single course, campaign, multiplayer -Four difficulty levels: easy, normal, hard, extreme -Story-based career mode with role-playing elements, special skills, and upgrades -Multiplayer: online and split-screen modes (up to 4 players). Online mode with a world-wide ranking system
